scrame.manager

Class CourseManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • scrame.manager.CourseManager

  • public final class CourseManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Static class that manage the individual course and all courses.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private static java.util.HashSet<Course> courseList
      The list of courses is stored in a HashSet.
      private static java.lang.String fileName
      The path to where the serialized form of the data to be stored.

      • addCourse

        public static void addCourse(java.lang.String courseName,
                             CourseType courseType,
                             java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.Integer> tempVacancies,
                             java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.String[]> tempWeightageList,
                             FacultyMember coordinator)
                      throws DuplicateCourseException,
                             IllegalWeightageException,
                             IllegalVacancyException
        Adds course into the courseList and insert it into textfile.
        Parameters:
        courseName - course name
        courseType - course type
        tempVacancies - temporary vacancies
        tempWeightageList - temporary weightage list
        coordinator - course coordinator
        Throws:
        DuplicateCourseException - if course with the same name already exists
        IllegalWeightageException - if weightage is not in proper format
        IllegalVacancyException - if vacancy is not in proper format

      • courseTypeToEnum

        public static CourseType courseTypeToEnum(java.lang.String tempCourseType)
                                   throws IllegalCourseTypeException
        Converts course type string to enum.
        Parameters:
        tempCourseType - string of course type
        Returns:
        CourseType object
        Throws:
        IllegalCourseTypeException - if course type is not LEC, TUT or LAB

      • isCourseInList

        public static boolean isCourseInList(java.lang.String courseName)
        Checks whether a course is in the list.
        Parameters:
        courseName - id of the course
        Returns:
        true if the course is in the list, false otherwise

        Finds the course object based on course name.
        Parameters:
        courseName - course name
        Returns:
        course object
        Throws:
        CourseNotFoundException - if no course found
